How it works

Connect your GitHub repo once. We handle the rest.

1

Connect GitHub

One-click OAuth. Select your repos. Done in under 2 minutes.

2

Publish a release

Tag your release like normal. We detect it automatically.

3

Notes ship everywhere

Customer, dev, and exec versions land in Slack, Discord, Email, and your changelog page.

Three audiences, three formats

The same release, reframed for each stakeholder. No more rewriting.

Customer Changelog

Benefit-driven, jargon-free updates your users will actually read.

""You can now export reports to PDF in one click""

Developer Changelog

Technical details, breaking changes, migration notes.

""BREAKING: API v1 deprecated. See migration guide.""

Stakeholder Brief

Executive summary with shipped vs planned and business impact.

""Q1 goal 80% complete. Key feature shipped ahead of schedule.""

Delivered to every port

Your release notes land where your team already lives.
